resources.string: Time traveling is just too dangerous. Better that I devote myself to study the other great mystery of the universe: women! © Dr. Emmett Brown
Come on, dude! We give you a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity and you can\'t even put a correct value in the field?
You gotta be kidding us! Put at least one %s!
Sure you need this? Looks like money is not a problem for you.
That would be so easy, right? We can\'t help you, your future is whatever you make it.
Hey! Take it easy, dude. You went too far in the past, Bitcoin hadn\'t been invented yet.
Bitcoin price is basically nothing now. Anyway, give yourself a big hand, nobody got as close as you, my friend.
Hello, Satoshi. It\'s been a while. We\'ve finally found you.
Hey, Laszlo. How was that pizza? Worth it?

How\'s it going, time traveller? With good luck and proper investment, you should\'ve become filthy rich already. Wanna say hi to the app developers and help them make their dreams come true (we\'re all wannabe caretakers of some tropical island)?
Hey, what’s up? I just travelled back to %1$s and bought some Bitcoins! Now I’m exorbitantly rich with my %2$s! Check this app out %3$s>
Nowadays time machine only needs to have a good internet connection instead of libyan plutonium.\nNo worries, we just need that once. Happy time travelling!
